hackathon-description-text: Swiss Re's reputation as a leader in the insurance industry is not by chance.  As a company, we are passionate about attracting and developing talent, and sparking innovation throughout the industry. We strongly believe in the power of innovation and are continually working to promote this culture within our company.
hackathon-requirements:
Hacker participants will be given a common project theme to guide the app design and development over the weekend. Projects will be judged based on a common judging criteria. (
Certain data sources (mainly open data sources) will be made available for participants in the following key risk categories:


Participants can choose to solely focus on the above categories and related data sources, but are also welcome to use their own creativity and sources to supplement or redefine the categories.
Additional details about the project will be communicated during the opening presentations.
Note: Ownership of the apps developed will remain with the development teams.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: FIRST PRIZE FOR THE WINNING TEAM

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=43 W 23rd St, New York, NY 10010, USA
hackathon-location-address: 43 W 23rd St, New York, NY 10010, USA
hackathon-description-header: The theme for the app is "My Personal Risk Advisor". It must incorporate at least one Watson cognitive component in the IBM Bluemix suite.
